about.title: About
about.introduction: Hello, I am KISSANGOU-OKAKA Délicia-Raelle, a passionate public health student at Marien NGOUABI University in Congo. An active member of the Épanouis (EPAN8) community as well as a U-Reporter by Unicef, I am committed to health promotion and disease prevention. Outside of my studies, I find relaxation in reading, video games, and music. I love attending conferences to broaden my knowledge and connect with professionals with similar interests.
about.goal: My goal is to become a qualified and influential professional in the field of public health, aiming to impact health policies and practices on a global scale.
